channel.title: [317] CorruptXile
channel.description:
Website: http://corruptxile.boards.net (getting a domain soon) client:http://www.mediafire.com/download/pc6j1jcz1ht6ni6/corruptxileRSPS.jar Some Features - Jad/Kiln - over 30 teleports - PKP system - PKP SHOP - Working God Wars - Online 24/7 Lag free
What is CorruptXile?
Welcome to CorruptXile, the RuneScape private server brought to you by System and Pkz. We have over 30 registered members, playable 24.7. Here at CorruptXile we take a different approach the other generic servers you come across. We work endlessly to bring you dedicated, high performance environment to play our enjoyable, content-filled server emulator. We invest alot of dollars into our secure and stable server architecture to ensure dedicated uptime and a fast connection, all protected behind high quality firewall mechanisms. Security and stability are very important to us, that's why we make sure we are the best around at offering this. In regard to content, we have a great many minigames to play, such as Castle Wars, Duel Arena all working bosses and Pest Control, as well as a few others. Each minigame is always actively being played with numerous rewards and incentives available to enhance your gaming experience. We also have some of the most enjoyable Pking around, our Wilderness zones are always packed with pkers.
